meta.description: The effectiveness of the flu vaccine between 1940s and now has declined significantly with more concerns about their composition.

title: Details About Flu Vaccine And Its Effectiveness
cleaned_text:
Have you ever wondered why you contract the ‘flu’ even though you’ve had your annual flu vaccine? I’ve heard questions about that conundrum, along with other laments, from many folks.

Also, one has to consider there are such things a “flu-like symptoms,” which often are confused with actual , according to the CDC. However, the CDC and others in the healthcare services industry make ‘educated guesses’ rather than analyzing cultures to scientifically ascertain if a patient has flu rather than flu-like symptoms, which they can lump under the category as “influenza” for skewed disease statistics, in my opinion. That’s why we hear flu can kill 4 thousand to 50 thousand people in the USA during a ‘flu’ season [4], when they actually die from pneumonia or other health complications. Some stats claim 12 thousand to 56 thousand people a year! [4] Will the REAL flu statistics please stand up? Or don’t they know and are just ‘guesstimating’?

Well, there’s overwhelming proof that flu vaccine efficacy (effectiveness) is not up to par with what it had been effective in flu vaccines back in the 1940s, as the chart below indicates, and .

The video below explains more about flu vaccines and how they are ’engineered’, plus the new for supposed higher efficacy, which is a genetically modified organism, that I have to dispute for more reasons than one! Also, they now are using insects [caterpillar DNA] to grow flu vaccines [4] since they want to get away from eggs. Do you want caterpillar DNA in your body? That’s not the only foreign DNA in vaccines; check out the CDC’s pink book [5] How about human diploid cells, which are lines of aborted fetus cells; monkey kidney cells; mouse brain cells and others you will find from other animals, which should not be injected in to humans !

Taking the above chart’s flu vaccine efficacy rates for the 1940s into consideration – in the 70s% to 90s% ranges, what’s happened over the intervening years to make flu vaccines less effective, if those stats really are accurate or not ‘memory lane hopefuls’?

My supposition is not the growing of vaccines in chicken eggs, which they apparently used in the 1940s forward and supposedly were efficacious, but , plus and formaldehyde/Formalin to vaccines, which, in my opinion, damage the very immune system they are trying to enhance with vaccines! You just can’t poison a body into wellness.

As Merck’s foremost [now deceased] and premiere vaccinologist Maurice Hilleman, MD, (developer of 40 vaccines) is famous for saying, “Vaccines have to be considered the bargain basement technology for the 20th Century.”

If Dr. Hilleman was so candid as to admit that, then shouldn’t healthcare consumers take that cryptic forewarning into consideration, even when Big Pharma/CDC/FDA seem to think and act contrary to what apparently seems to be common sense, since more, new and serious health problems escalate higher and higher with the addition of more and more mandated vaccines? However, vaccines are a huge moneymaker for both the CDC/FDA and Big Pharma!

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention own 57 vaccine patents [2]. Plus CDC is a business listed on NASDAQ for trading. NASDAQ price quote Jan. 9, 2018 10:25 AM EST $46.8098 USD [3].

Is that why everyone in the USA is mandated from birth to take vaccines—probably in order to generate funding to help ‘float’ a federal agency’s budget—because their doesn’t make sense!

A Letter From Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. and Robert De Niro to American Journalists 

 https://www.ecowatch.com/kennedy-deniro-vaccines-2262189554.html?xrs=RebelMouse_fb&ts=1487176227

Examining RFK Jr.’s claim that the CDC “Owns over 20 vaccine patents.” 

 https://www.greenmedinfo.com/blog/examining-rfk-jrs-claim-cdc-owns-over-20-vaccine-patents
